Module org.monarchinitiative.phenol.annotations
Package org.monarchinitiative.phenol.annotations.assoc

Class Mim2GeneMedgenLoader

java.lang.Object
org.monarchinitiative.phenol.annotations.assoc.Mim2GeneMedgenLoader
public class Mim2GeneMedgenLoader extends Object
Parse mim2gene_medgen, which is available at https://ftp.ncbi.nih.gov/gene/DATA/mim2gene_medgen into DiseaseToGeneAssociations container.

This file contains links between NCBI Gene Ids and OMIM identifiers for Mendelian and polygenic diseases. The class offers a static function that return a DiseaseToGeneAssociations container with disease to gene associations. The GeneToAssociation objects describe genes (as TermIds and Gene Symbols) and the AssociationType (Mendelian or Polygenic).

The class requires data from the NCBI Gene Homo_sapiens.gene_info.gz to get the gene symbol for NCBI Gene ids because the mim2gene_medgen only has the ids (for instance, mim2gene_medgen represents the fibrillin-1 gene by its NCBI Gene id of 2200, and we extract the corresponding gene symbol FBN1 from Homo_sapiens.gene_info.gz).

Author:
Daniel Danis, Peter N Robinson
